name: Alice.tech
long_description:
Alice.tech makes learning and exam prep simple by turning course materials into personalized notes, exercises and exam simulations. As students interact with Alice.tech, we spot their study gaps for targeted learning.

Over 1,000 students have already paid us to prepare for their exams and we are growing MRR +30% MoM for B2C alone, while gaining first traction in B2B on top.
one_liner: Alice.tech turns course materials into personalized exam prep using AI
